title: [Large-Scale] Environmental Art Design Education Using Problem-Based Dual Master Learning Environment

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of basic environmental design principles, digital tool proficiency, and experience in creative problem-solving
context.additional_context: Students engage in project-based learning integrating theory and practice to solve real-world environmental issues, with collaboration emphasized through personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world environmental issues and creatively propose sustainable design solutions.
Learners can collaborate with peers in a problem-based learning environment to create design prototypes using digital/analog tools.
Learners can revise design outcomes based on expert feedback and conduct self-assessment according to final evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
